name: mithril-interactive-tutorial
description: Step-by-step lessons on using the Mithril MVC framework

scripts.tutorial: npm run clean-build; npm run make-directories; npm run copy-files; npm run watch-js & npm run watch-stylus & npm run serve
scripts.copy-files: cp -Rf src/*.html build/; cp -Rf src/assets build/
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run make-directories && npm run copy-files && browserify src/app.coffee -t stringify -t coffeeify -o build/bundle.js && stylus src/styles -o build/styles

author: pelonpelon
